speaker: Bala Venkataraman
title: Build Recap | Introduction to Azure ML CLI v2 and SDK v2
description:
Bala Venkataraman is here to educate users about the Azure Machine Learning CLI v2 and Python SDK v2 - one of the exciting Build 2022 announcements.
